name: TestimonialCardTen
description: Split layout testimonial section with titled quote card, navigation arrows, and media display. Supports card and border variants.

description.example: See what our customers have to say

title.note: Headline/title displayed at top of quote card

quote.example: Working with this AI has been a game changer! It feels like the system really listens and adapts to what I need.

imageSrc.note: Image source URL (either imageSrc or videoSrc required)

videoSrc.note: Video source URL (either imageSrc or videoSrc required)

propsSchema.testimonials: Array<{ id: string, title: string, quote: string, name: string, role: string, imageSrc?: string, videoSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, videoAriaLabel?: string }>
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample: <TestimonialCardTen testimonials={[{ id: '1', title: 'Personalized AI, redefined with Mindex', quote: 'Working with this AI has been a game changer! It feels like the system really listens and adapts to what I need.', name: 'Sarah Mitchell', role: 'CEO of BrightPath Solutions', imageSrc: '/images/testimonial1.webp', imageAlt: 'Sarah Mitchell' }]} title="Trusted by industry leaders" description="See what our customers have to say" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground="noInvert" />
dont: Do not use more than 4 items
